#include<stdio.h>int main(int argc, char *argv[]){    double a[19]={0.01218354,-0.009012882,-0.02881839,-0.04743239,-0.04584568,-0.008692503,0.06446265£¬0.1544655,0.2289794,0.257883,0.2289794,0.1544655,0.06446265,-0.008692503,-0.04584568,-0.04743239,-0.02881839,-0.009012882,0.01218354};short b[19];int i;for(i=0;i<19;i++){
b[i]=a[i]*32768; printf("0x%hx,",b[i]);
}return 0;
}
